Thank you for sharing information about your school’s computer science program and your continued support of our mission to give every student the opportunity to learn computer science.

Here are steps that you can take to expand computer science access to more students in your local region:

  • If you’re a district or school administrator, see our Administrator guide for expanding access in your school or district.

  • If you’re a teacher, view our curriculum options for teaching computer science to your students - no computer science experience necessary.

  • If you’re a parent or community member, take an action to encourage your local school to offer computer science.

In just a few years, support for computer science has impacted hundreds of thousands of classrooms and tens of millions of students. Many school districts, U.S. states, and even entire countries have joined the movement.

Please follow our progress on Facebook or on Twitter to stay in touch.

Thank you so much for your support,

Hadi Partovi
Founder, Code.org

You’re receiving this email because you provided information about your local school on Code.org. Code.org is a 501c3 non-profit. Our address is 1501 4th Avenue, Suite 900, Seattle, WA 98101.
